reviews.content: amazing dev. works beautifully. gorgeous tweak!
When you open up the ‘add to playlist’ menu for the second time since app has been open, it crashes and exits the whole apple music app.
It was working now it’s not. If someone could help that would be great. I really like it.
Doesn’t break anything, but also doesn’t change anything.

Works perfectly on my 
iPhone 11 Pro Max ( A13 ) 
iOS 13.5 
Unc0ver 5.0.0
@iTollMouS
